result.execSummary:
The defendant Reginald Brooks was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Resisting an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: CONSECUTIVE to Ct.1 in this file and to file 16CF206.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Reginald Brooks

records.addlTxt: Terminated - Regular
Revoked - Sentenced to Prison

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Court reporter transcript invoice for 6/9/16 sentencing paid by county $25.00 for files 16cm114 & 16cf206
6/9/16 - Sentencing Hearing
kmk

Minutes:  16CF206/16CM114.  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty James Fields-Bowers & Atty Hilary Edwards.  Victim rights compliance.  Sentencing arguments made.  

16CF206 - deft sentenced to 90 days KCJ to any previously imposed sentence.  Costs rolled into sentence.   

16CM114 - (ct 1) - deft sentenced to 90 days KCJ consecutive to 16CF206.  (ct 2) - deft sentenced to 9mos KCJ consecutive to count 1 in this file and 16FCF206.  Costs rolled into sentences.  
Since deft is presently serving a prison sentence - court expects these sentences will be served in the prison as well.

NOTE - all sentences in these two files are consecutive to each other and consecutive to any previously imposed sentences.  

DNA ordered; notice given to deft.  Appeal rights.

Email received from defense counsel requesting sentencing hrg of 6/10/16 be moved up; deft needs to be at Dodge on Monday and the transport leaves the KCJ on Friday morning.  Sentencing hrg moved up to 6/9/16 @ 2:30pm; email sent to all parties including conveyance requesting the transport be moved up.

Minutes:  16CF206/16CM114.  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty James Fields-Bowers & Atty Hilary Edwards.  Cases are resolved.  Victim rights compliance. 

16CF206 - deft pleads guilty to count 3; found guilty by the Court.  Remaining counts are dismissed on State's motion.

16CM114 - deft pleads guilty to both counts; found guilty by the Court.

Sentencing set over to 6/10/16 @ 10:45am; court would like to review the PSI from 12CF305.

Minutes:  16CM114/16CF206.  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty James Fields-Bowers.  State moves to consolidate cases 16CM114 & 16CF206.  Arguments heard.  Court's bias is towards granting the State's motion to consolidate; Court will adjourn today's hrg to 6/7/16 @ 10:30am to allow co-counsel (Atty Hilary Edwards) to be present at well.
State's Memorandum in Support of State's Motion to Consolidate Cases for Trial and to Admit Other Acts Evidence
of the State to Consolidate Cases for Trial
Jury selection on June 20, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Final pre-trial on June 1, 2016 at 09:10 am.

FPT/JS dates of 3/10 & 3/28 are removed from the Court's calendar on request of defense counsel with no objection by the State.  New dates are as follows FPT 6/1/16 @ 9:10am & JS 6/20/16 @ 9am on both files (16CF206 & 16CM114).  Email sent to attys.  Deft has pending revocation hrg for 3/30/16.
Filed by Atty J Fields-Bowers.
Atty  J Fields-Bowers
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

114pm

Defendant requests Jury Trial.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 5, 2016 at 01:45 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for March 10, 2016 at 10:20 am.  Jury selection scheduled for March 28, 2016 at 09:00 am.  PO Hold.  $250  Cash Bond Set w/conditions (see bond entry).    jk
